raw akas.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids

akas: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (original title)
akas from release info: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (original title)

1.title: Cold Feet and Hot Tempers

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Renee deal's with her friend's jealousy after appointing her Â"man of honor.Â" Kirstie must choose if she will change her vision of the wedding to comfort her friend. For Rachel, the fitting of the bridesmaids dressing is proving to be rather difficult.

2.title: Girl Power

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Amy brings her fiancé as back up against her bullying sister. Vilma wants a dress that is the exact same shade of green as her emerald engagement ring. Sarah's nerves sky rocket when one bridesmaid's dress has a zipper malfunction before the big day.

3.title: PhD in Persuasion

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Young bride Kelsey arrives at Lori's with a crew full of teenage drama. Bride Shadonna's sister uses her psychology background to manipulate the bride. Melia's feeling the pressure when her sister orders her dress four sizes too small.

4.title: Jarring Politics

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Angelina wants a simple country wedding but her sister has a different vision. Esther's maid of honor has given herself veto power over all dresses. One of Meghan's bridesmaids lives in Switzerland and won't be able to try on the dress until the big day.

5.title: Pray for Peace

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Heather threatens to become a runaway bride after her military-man fiancé acts like a drill sergeant when picking out dresses. Jasmine calls herself a reformed mean-girl but when dress shopping gets difficult, her mean-girl spirit rears its head.

6.title: Falling Apart at the Seams

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Two grooms have high hopes for their big day, but when Michael and Chris's visions clash, will their dream wedding be compromised? Kandice is not a happy bride when her bridesmaid goes rogue and campaigns to make the gowns herself.

7.title: Mudslingin' Mamas

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Bride Jessica's brash Southern Mama is full of immature antics causing her bridesmaids to feel self-conscious in their dresses. Bride Diontay's mom makes her disapproving opinion known, and Brooke's bridesmaids are cutting it close- in more ways than one.

8.title: Catfight on the Catwalk

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Bride Cassie's fighting maids threaten their relationship with the bride. After shopping at over fifteen stores, indecisive bride Joy still can't make up her mind. Bride Meghan selects a special bridesmaid dress to make sure her friend feels beautiful.

9.title: Singled Out

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Cortney's maid of honor fights back when she is singled out. Jenna's maid of honor is a single-mom whose tight budget threatens their chances of finding a dress. Lisa is afraid her traditional Italian family will dislike the bridal party's modern style.

10.title: Breaking the Rules

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Bride Katy walks out of the store, after her party girl sister advocates for short maids dresses. Same-sex couple, Amber and Ajeshia, may be in love with each other, but not with each other's vision. Alyssa fears her dress choice will irk her tomboy maid.

1.title: Peacocks, Pink and Purple

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: A bride who loves peacocks and a bride who loves purple are both battling their bridesmaids. Lori's team is working overtime to keep these bridal parties from exploding. And another bride prays for pink dresses to save her wedding day.

2.title: The Sister Standoff

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Selfish sisters are running wild in the salon, causing dress shopping chaos for the brides. Jealousy and bickering abound as Lori and her team race to control the sibling rivalry. And a bride breaks down after seeing her dresses for the first time.

3.title: Fur Muffs and Fickle Friends

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: A bride wants fur muffs for her winter wedding but her Maid of Honor is fighting her. Meanwhile, a bride's fickle friend shocks everyone by refusing to be a in the wedding unless she gets the dress she likes. A tipsy bride is about to cut her dress.

4.title: Brides Against Bridesmaids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Two brides make huge mistakes by letting their bridesmaids choose their own dresses. Later, Lori and her team have to take control so that these parties don't go down the aisle looking crazy. A missing bridesmaids dress threatens to ruin one wedding day.

5.title: A Tale of Two Bridesmaids Dresses

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Bride Julie is fighting with her party because she wants 2 groups and 2 different dresses- one for bridesmaids and one for the honorary bridesmaids. Talya has big problems with her bridal party and Lori's team is having a tough time pulling dresses.

6.title: The Groomzilla

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Lori's #1 rule is no men in her salon. But these brides have ignored that and now there's more than one rooster in this hen house. The men start causing trouble right away for the brides and bridesmaids, and Lori's team has to take control.

1.title: Maid of Honorzilla

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: A bride gets into a heated argument with her selfish Maid of Honor, who wants to steal the spotlight. And another bride's vision of a one-shoulder gown doesn't work for her busty Maid of Honor.

2.title: Not So Identical Twins

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Family drama heats up the salon as a bride and her identical twin gang up against their tearful older sister. Meanwhile another bride is in a lockdown fight with her mother over low cut dresses that show off her bridesmaid's "twins."

3.title: Mini Maid of Honor

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: A bride teams up with her 7-year-old Maid of Honor and little sister, to battle against their pushy older sister. Another bride fights over dress styles with her fashion forward brother - Bridals by Lori Consultant Brandon.

4.title: Budget Bullies & Busty Bridesmaids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: One bossy and busty Bridesmaid my ruin the entire dress shopping experience when she hates every gown the bride loves. Meanwhile another bridesmaid refuses to spend just $6 dollars more than the budget on a dress the Bride loves.

5.title: Designer Dreams and Indecisive Brides

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: A last minute Bride needs to order a dress for her maids but she can't make up her mind and her girls are ready to mutiny. Meanwhile another Bride knows exactly what she wants - 3 different color dresses - but her maids HATE the look.

6.title: Maids Against Modesty

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: The hunt for a Modest Bridesmaids dress leaves a Mother of the Bride in tears. Another Bride battles her maids who have turned in to a 3-headed wedding monster. And a bride is anxious to see if her maid can squeeze into a dress that's 3 sizes too small.

7.title: It's a Drag Being a Bridesmaid

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: A Bride comes in with a non-traditional wedding party that includes a Drag Queen "Bridesman." Another Bride has her track teammates by her side but these competitive maids try to run the appointment.

8.title: Showdown at the Bridesmaids Corral

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Lori's salon is overflowing with super Southern Brides. One wants her girls to look like grapes in purple and green dresses for her winery wedding. And another Backwoods Bride is looking for "Denim" dresses.

9.title: Insults and Insecurities

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: It's an emotional day at Lori's salon. A Bride is devastated to learn that her daughter has serious body image issues. Another Bride has devastating insults for her maids, putting her friendships in jeopardy.

10.title: Nautical Navy and Military Maids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: One bride fights her mother for control of the dress choice, and a military bride battles her maids over how sexy her dresses should be. Plus, a scientific bride puts her nerdy bridesmaids in "Hoochie Red" dresses for her beach wedding.

11.title: Many Dresses for Many Maids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Lori's team has their hands full looking for multiple dresses for multiple maids. One Bride is looking for 8 different dresses for her girls! And another is only trying to find 2 but it's taking forever.

12.title: Mother Knows Bridesmaids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: The Mothers of the Brides are in control of the salon today. One is a church pastor who doesn't want the sexy short dresses her daughter loves, while another mother doesn't want her daughter to get married at all.

13.title: Sweet Brides and Sour Sisters

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Bride Sheena's sister is getting married just 30 days after her, and their sibling rivalry is heating things up at Lori's salon. Meanwhile country bride Lyndsey is so sweet that she can't control her spicy bridesmaids.

14.title: Jump for Joy with Your Country Cousins

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Today's brides have serious family issues on their hands. One bride is battling a sister who wants to show off her big chest, while another bride won't pick a dress unless her entire family agrees to it.

15.title: Bridesmaids Are No Angels

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: A bridesmaid named Angel turns out to be anything but as she takes over control of the appointment. Another Bride is hoping a replacement bridesmaid can fit into a dress that was ordered for someone else.

16.title: Sorority Sisters & Sassy Sisters

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: A bride has a divided wedding party as her sassy sorority sisters gang up on her childhood friend. While a bride and her sister who are getting married just a month apart battle over the same bridesmaid dress.

17.title: Father Doesn't Know Bridesmaids Best

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: A bride's bossy Father takes over her shopping trip and vetoes dress after dress. While another bride has to battle bridesmaids who think the honorary bridesmaids are second-class citizens.

18.title: Say Yes to the Short Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: A bride battles her Â"Honorary Brides ManÂ" for control of her dress choice, while a same sex couple fights over color choice. And a bride with a notorious maid of honor returns to Lori's with big news about her bridal party.

1.title: Thou Shall Not Wear Strapless

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: A bride's best friend can also be her worst enemy, and that fact is on display in Lori's salon today. One bride's BFF hates every dress she sees. While another bride's best friend walks off the runway and refuses to be in the wedding in a strapless dress.

2.title: Mama-In-Law Knows Best

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: A Bride battles her bossy future mother in law over short dresses, while another bride battles her bossy older sister who is insisting on standing out from the rest of the maids. And Bride gets into a dress dispute with her opinionated wedding planner.

3.title: Trouble with the Twins

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Family drama heats up the salon as a bride and her identical twin gang up against their tearful older sister. Meanwhile another bride is in a lockdown fight with her mother over low cut dresses that show off her bridesmaid's "twins." #SayYesToTheDress

4.title: 22 Brawling Bridesmaids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: A bride has a record breaking bridal party with 22 bridesmaids, while another bride is dealing with bridesmaids who are brawling over control of the dress. And down in fittings a bride is in tears because her maid doesn't fit into the dress.

5.title: No Passion for Fashion

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: A bride gets bullied by her groom's sexy sister and has to fight for dresses that cover her maids. And a fashion challenged bride frustrates her maids with her complete lack of style sense.

6.title: Pink, Pink, Pink!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Monte has his hands full as he takes over the bridesmaids department for Lori. One bride battles her mom who wants her maids to look like pink ballerinas, while another bride is trying to avoid a war by letting dueling maids pick their own dress.

7.title: Miss America's Maids

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: The salon is buzzing with excitement because Miss America 2010, Caressa Cameron, has arrived to select bridesmaid dresses for her five-star wedding. However, the pressure to look perfect for Miss America's wedding is paralyzing one of her maids.

8.title: Maids Gotta Go-Go

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: A nasty MOB threatens to ruin her daughter's appointment when she lashes out at one of the maids, while another bride struggles to convince her exotic dancer sister to don a dress suitable for her traditional church nuptials.

9.title: Black Sheep

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Big hair and big personalities take over this appointment when a bride and her wedding planner fight for the final say. Plus, with 8 older siblings a baby of the family has to find the courage to stand up to her stubborn sisters.

10.title: Political Parties

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Two maids campaign for the ultimate bridal title of Maid of Honor, while another bride has to convince a groomsmaid that it's her day, her way and her fiancé. And in fittings, a bride wonders if she'll have a change of heart about the color of her dresses

11.title: Tiaras and Tribulations

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Lori returns to the shop and helps Bride Jodian, whose sister is demanding to wear a tiara at the wedding. Across the salon, Bride Lindsay has some busty maids, making shopping a challenge.

12.title: Orange Appeal

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: One bride faces a power struggle when her bossy older sister teams up with her fiancÃ© in favor of bridesmaids dresses in college colors she can't stand, another bride has big demands for her second trip down the aisle

13.title: Potty Party

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Bride Kymberly drops a bombshell that sends one of her maids running to the bathroom in tears. And another bride is fighting her mother/maid-of-honor for a slinky sequined dress that is way out of this self-proclaimed "old maid's" comfort zone

14.title: In-Law and Order

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Bride Courtney learns very quickly that family isn't always on your side. Another bride struggles to get any dress opinions from her bridesmaids. Downstairs in fittings, a war is waging on whether a Â"fascinatorÂ" piece should be left on her maids' dresses.

15.title: Sisters and Frothers

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Bride Maria's bossy big sister is fighting her tooth and nail over her vision of having the bridesmaids wear a form-fitting dress, while Bride Lindsey is waging her own battle with her mom over dress necklines.

16.title: Size Matters...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: A husband-hunting bridesmaid threatens to leave the bridal party if she's not able to show off her bod in a short sexy dress, while another maid's body issues are brought to light in a battle against the Â"skinny maids.Â"

17.title: Show Up and Shut Up

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Bride Brooke told her bridesmaids they need to just Â"show up and shut upÂ" during the appointment. But when she has trouble deciding on a color her maids start getting fed up! And across the salon, Bride Kristy is afraid to upset any of her 5 sisters.

18.title: Daycare by Lori

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: With pouting, jealousy, and tears at an all-time high, the salon is truly feeling like a daycare center! A teenage tantrum erupts after one bride favors her future stepdaughter to model dresses instead of her own 19-year-old daughter.

locations: Bridals By Lori, Atlanta, Georgia, USA
imdb.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids
plot: Soon to be brides search for "the dress" taking their close family and friends to help find it::Nour Baroud
